item.title: Wellspring 1: My First Attempt at a Game
item.description: Introduction On the advice of my brother, I decided to start writing up about my work developing a game by myself. So here goes. I started working on this a long time ago, so this work goes all the way back in time to September-ish 2019. I have always enjoyed playing games a lot (some would say too much) and after working in the aerospace industry for a few years I sorta decided that it is not really my lifeâ€™s passion.
